titleStmt.title: An entry from the Journals of Hensley Henson

sourceDesc.bibl: Edited from the manuscripts in the custody of Durham Cathedral Library.

body.p: I attended the Judges' service in the Abbey: and afterwards went to Islington, & read a paper to the clergy on "Intercommunion & Reunion". Then I went to the Military Hospital to see Captn Miller, who is dying.
